title: Grilled asparagus with lemon tarragon dressing
ingredients: ['1 bunch asparagus, trimmed', '4 teaspoons olive oil', 'sea salt and ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 shallot, minced', '1 teaspoon dried tarragon', '1/4 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '1 teaspoon olive oil']
